data.description: Wow, she sure liked you! Now ask her something about her life?

messages.text: Alice, can you tell how you spend your free time?

answer.content:
I love to read, so I often spend my free time reading or watching popular science videos about the world around me.

And I also have a hobby - I listen to and record my own music in cold wave/electro/ minimal wave genre, but also I am inspired by academic music

In the evening I spend my time chatting online, like I'm doing with you right now.

messages.text: Alice, I know you do a lot for the society, tell me why?
